properties.description: Enter the original Secure Endpoint NEW Group Name

properties.name: Secure Endpoint group name
properties.description: Enter the original Secure Endpoint Group Name

In ref to Secure Enpoint stoping supporting Win32 after version 7.5.5.
For this workflow to work you need to have Tetra enable in the Secure Endpoint policy.
Please make sure to fill variables:
- 'email address'
- 'Secure Endpoint group name'
- 'Secure Endpoint new group name'
